wind_walker.description: Walk upon the wind, gaining increased speed and evasion

storm_cloud.description: A storm cloud that damages enemies over time with lightning

sky_shield.description: A protective barrier of sky energy that absorbs damage

star_blessing.description: Blessing from the stars that increases all stats

tailwind.description: A tailwind that increases speed and grants temporary flight

cloud_form.description: Phase into cloud form, reducing physical damage and gaining levitation

storm_boost.description: Channel the power of the storm, greatly increasing lightning damage

stardust_heal.description: Magical stardust that restores health and grants brief invulnerability

thunder_charge.description: Build up thunder energy for a powerful attack

lightning_shield.description: Surround yourself with a shield of lightning that damages attackers

wind_fury.description: Enter a fury of wind, increasing attack speed and critical chance

star_guidance.description: The stars guide your attacks, increasing accuracy and critical damage

storm_witness.description: Witness the storm's power, gaining resistance to lightning

aerial_advantage.description: Gain the advantage of flight, ignoring terrain penalties

nebula_embrace.description: Embrace the nebula's power, restoring MP over time

comet_fury.description: Channel comet energy for devastating fire and lightning attacks

pressure_wave.description: Manipulate air pressure to weaken enemies

celestial_guardian.description: Call upon celestial beings to protect you

wind_barrier.description: Create a barrier of wind that blocks projectiles

storm_surge.description: Surge with storm energy, increasing all damage output
